channel.title: Computational Geometry on AesVoy
channel.description: Recent content in Computational Geometry on AesVoy

item.title: Delaunay Triangulation
item.description: Delaunay triangulation is a process that takes a set of points in n-dimensional space as input and returns a network of triangles connecting these points. The resulting structure is called a triangulation or mesh.

item.title: Voronoi Diagram
item.description: Voronoi diagrams, also known as Dirichlet tessellation or Thiessen polygons, are everywhere in nature. You’ve likely encountered them thousands of times, but perhaps didn’t know what they were called.
